spells.name: Adhesive Spittle
spells.description: Spit a tanglefoot bag at a creature.

spells.name: Blurred Movement
spells.description: As blur, but only while you are moving.

spells.name: Body Capacitance
spells.description: Store electricity attacks used against you and release the energy as a touch attack.

spells.name: Heightened Awareness
spells.description: Your recall and ability to process information improve.

spells.name: Invisibility Alarm
spells.description: As alarm, but reacting only to invisible creatures.

spells.name: Long Arm
spells.description: Your arms lengthen, giving you extra reach.

spells.name: Monkey Fish
spells.description: Gain a climb speed and a swim speed of 10 ft. for a time.

spells.name: Phantom Blood
spells.description: Gain temporary hp if Con loss would knock you out or kill you.
